original: The only way to get to my brother is by following in the Initiates' footsteps and traveling from wayshrine to wayshrine just as they did.
string: 要見我兄弟只能追隨入門生的腳步，從一座指路祭壇前往下一座，就跟入門生一樣。

original: The first lay at the end of Darkfall Passage, a cavern that represents the absence of enlightenment.
string: 第一座位在暗臨通道的底部。那座洞穴象徵著啟發的失落。

original: Good, they should be able to help us.
string: 很好，他們應該能幫上忙。

original: I'm afraid in their current form, they still believe the Chantry to be an active center of worship.
string: 以他們目前的型態，他們恐怕依然深信聖殿仍是從前那個活躍的信仰中心。

original: They won't respond to you in any way other than believing that you're an Initiate and you're undertaking the journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: 他們會把你視為入門生，也僅會依此想法作回應，有如你剛踏上內部聖所的旅程般。

original: Who are the spectral Prelates you mentioned?
string: 你提到的那些幽靈主教是誰？

original: They're ghosts of the snow elf priests that tended the wayshrines before being slaughtered by the Betrayed.
string: 他們是雪精靈祭司的鬼魂，被背離之徒屠殺之前負責管理指路祭壇。

original: Through the grace of Auri-El, they were restored to their spectral form to enable them to continue their duties.
string: 透過奧瑞-艾爾的恩典，他們被化為靈魂型態來繼續執行他們的職責。

original: So, let's get this straight.
string: 讓我整理一下。

original: We need to do all that nonsense to get into the temple, so we can kill your brother and claim Auriel's Bow?
string: 我們需要做這些亂七八糟的事情進入神殿，還要殺死你的兄弟才能拿到奧麗瑞的弓？

original: Wayshrine?
string: 指路祭壇？

original: Yes, let me show you.
string: 是的，我讓你看看。

original: What exactly did the Betrayed do?
string: 背離之徒到底做了什麼？

original: They swept into the Chantry without warning and began killing everyone without pause.
string: 他們突然闖入聖殿，見人就殺。

original: I imagine you know why we're here.
string: 你應該知道我們來的目的吧。

original: Of course. You're here for Auriel's Bow. Why else would you be here?
string: 當然。你們想要奧麗瑞的弓。還會有別的原因嗎？

original: I can help you get it, but first I must have your assistance.
string: 我可以幫你取得它，但首先，我需要你的協助。

original: Why?
string: 為什麼？

original: Because that means there's still hope that they might one day shed their hatred and learn to believe in Auri-El once again.
string: 這代表他們以後還有機會拋棄仇恨，重拾對奧瑞-艾爾的信仰。

original: It's been a long time since I felt that way and it's been long overdue. My thanks, to both of you.
string: 我很久沒有那樣的感受了，也早該是時候了。謝謝你們。

original: He was a vampire. He controlled them.
string: 烏叔爾是吸血鬼。背離之徒被他控制。

original: A vampire?
string: 吸血鬼？

original: I see. That would explain much.
string: 我懂了。這樣一切就說得通了。

original: Deep inside, it brings me joy that the Betrayed weren't to blame for what happened here.
string: 內心深處，我很高興這一切不用怪罪於背離之徒。

original: You took a big risk coming here.
string: 妳居然願意冒著危險前來。

original: I did. But something about you makes me think I can trust you. I hope I'm not wrong.
string: 是啊。那是因為我覺得我可以信任你。我希望我沒判斷錯誤。

original: Anyway, my mother and I didn't feel like inviting a war with all of Tamriel, so we tried to stop him. That's why I was sealed away with the Scroll.
string: 總之，我跟我母親不打算跟整座泰姆瑞爾大陸開戰，所以我們試著阻止他。那也是為何我會跟卷軸一起被封印起來。

original: What do you mean... "lost himself"?
string: 什麼意思......「陷入其中」？

original: He just became absorbed... obsessed. It was kind of sick, actually.
string: 他完全沉浸其中......應該說是入迷了。那整件事都很不尋常。

original: The prophecy said that vampires would no longer need to fear the sun. For someone who fancied himself as vampire royalty, that's pretty seductive.
string: 預言說道，吸血鬼將不再畏懼陽光。對於一個自認為吸血鬼貴族的人而言，那句話非常吸引人。

original: I wonder what these souls do all day. They look... bored.
string: 真想知道那些靈魂整天在做什麼。他們看起來很......無聊。

original: Be careful with those crystals. They feel... hungry.
string: 小心那些水晶。它們好像......餓了。

original: Another one of those things. Let's keep our distance.
string: 又來一隻。保持距離。

original: Ugh. The smell here... let's try to handle this quickly.
string: 呃。這裡真臭......我們動作加快吧。

original: I need to trade some things with you.
string: 我要和妳交換物品。

original: This better not be all the things you just can't be bothered with.
string: 最好別把你不要的東西都丟給我。

original: Anything good?
string: 有好東西嗎？

original: If you think it'll help.
string: 如果你覺得有幫助的話。

original: All right, let's see what you have.
string: 好吧，來看看你有什麼。

original: Why don't you keep your things, and I'll keep mine.
string: 這樣吧，你的東西你自己留著，我的東西我也留著。

original: I think I'll hang on to my things, thank you.
string: 我的東西還是自己留著就好，謝謝。

original: Hands to yourself.
string: 別碰我的東西。

original: Not going to happen.
string: 想得美。

original: My congratulations on defeating Harkon. Clearly, you are the superior vampire.
string: 恭喜您擊敗赫岡，顯然您才是較強大的吸血鬼。

original: You are the new Master; we bow to your power. A power which, I note, includes Auriel's Bow.
string: 您是新的主人，我們臣服於您的力量之下。當然，我們也臣服於奧麗瑞的弓。

original: The castle, of course, is yours. We shall follow you, and help spread your influence across Skyrim.
string: 城堡當然也屬於您。我們將追隨您，協助您擴大在泰姆瑞爾的勢力。

original: Run, coward! Run back to the filthy Dawnguard!
string: 跑吧，懦夫！回去找那些骯髒的暮光守衛。

original: Run, coward! You're a traitor to your race!
string: 跑吧，懦夫！背叛自己種族的叛徒！

original: When I find you, I'm going to gut you like a deer and feast upon you blood!
string: 我如果找到你，我會把你當成野鹿抽筋剝皮然後喝光你的血！

original: Enough games, let's finish this!
string: 玩夠了。做個了結吧！

original: It ends here!
string: 要結束了！

original: I'll rend the flesh from your bones!
string: 我會讓你骨肉分離！

original: I will darken the skies!
string: 我會讓天空被黑暗壟罩！

original: Auriel's Bow will be mine!
string: 奧麗瑞的弓將是我的！

original: What trickery is this?
string: 這是什麼法術？

original: Hiding won't help you!
string: 躲起來是沒用的！

original: No... Serana... your own father....
string: 妳居然......瑟拉娜......妳自己的父親......

original: Die, mortal!
string: 死吧，凡人！

original: Die, traitor!
string: 死吧，叛徒！

original: Your blood will be mine!
string: 你的血是我的！

original: I'll drain the life from you!
string: 我會吸乾你的生命！

original: I should have killed you and your mother long ago!
string: 我早該把妳跟妳母親殺了！

original: I'll make you pay for this, daughter!
string: 我會讓妳為此付出代價的，女兒！

original: You dare defy your father?!
string: 妳居然敢違抗妳的父親？！

original: First you die, then Serana suffers!
string: 你會先死，接著換瑟拉娜受苦！

original: Serana isn't yours, she's mine!
string: 瑟拉娜不是你的，她是我的！

original: You've turned her against me!
string: 你居然讓她背叛我！

original: Die, you traitorous dog!
string: 去死吧，你這隻背叛我的畜牲！

original: How dare you disobey me!
string: 你居然敢不服從我！

original: You'll pay for your insolence!
string: 你會為你的傲慢付出代價的！

original: You can't stop the prophecy!
string: 你無法阻止預言的！

original: I'll rip the Dawnguard apart!
string: 我會把暮光守衛撕裂！

original: I despise your presence, mortal!
string: 你的存在讓我作嘔，凡人！

original: May Auri-El keep you free from harm.
string: 願奧瑞-艾爾讓你免於傷害。

original: May Auri-El watch over you.
string: 願奧瑞-艾爾守護你。

original: May Auri-El light your path.
string: 願奧瑞-艾爾照亮你的道路。

original: Look, take whatever you want. I'm getting out of here!
string: 聽著，你要什麼都拿去。我先走了！

original: Help me!
string: 幫我！

original: I'm getting out of here!
string: 我要先走了！

original: Gods, Vampires! I... I can't take this anymore! I'm not cut out for this!
string: 神啊，吸血鬼！我......我受不了了！我很軟弱。

original: Stand aside!
string: 讓開！

original: Forgive me, but I am on urgent business for the Dawnguard. I have no time to speak with you.
string: 抱歉，但是我急於處理暮光守衛的事務。我沒有時間跟你說話。

original: Stand aside!
string: 讓開！

original: Forgive me, but I am on urgent business for the Dawnguard. Stand aside!
string: 抱歉，但是我急於處理暮光守衛的事務。讓開！

original: Halt, vampire!
string: 停下，吸血鬼！

original: Your end has come!
string: 你的末日來了！

original: Light take you!
string: 願光放逐你！

original: Death to the Dawnguard!
string: LOOKUP FAILED!

original: Perish, worm!
string: 死吧，蛆蟲！

original: Shadows take you!
string: 被黑暗壟罩吧！

original: That's close enough, fool. Now you die!
string: 居然敢靠過來，傻子，受死吧！

original: You there! Traveler! Over here!
string: 喂，旅行者！來這裡！

original: Well met, friend. We've been chasing that fiend for a long time. On behalf of the Vigil, you have my thanks.
string: 幸會，朋友。我們花了好多時間追捕這隻魔鬼。我代表警戒者感謝你。

original: It's done, then. We've been chasing that fiend for a long time.
string: 結束了。我們已經追捕那隻惡魔很久了。

original: Any idea why the vampires attacked the Vigilants?
string: 你知道為何吸血鬼會攻擊警戒者嗎？

original: I suspect now it was Brother Adalvald's journals they were after. He was obsessed with ancient vampire artifacts and burial sites.
string: 我想他們的目標是阿達瓦拉德弟兄的日記。他過於沉迷於上古的吸血鬼遺物跟墓穴。

original: Forget me, who are you?
string: 抱歉，請問妳是？

original: My name is Serana. Were you... sent to wake me?
string: 我叫瑟拉娜。你是被派來......喚醒我的嗎？

original: Who sent you?
string: 是誰叫你來的？

original: I don't see another way. I'll become a vampire.
string: 我沒別的選擇。我要變成吸血鬼。

original: Are you sure? I'm willing to turn you, but you need to think it through.
string: 你確定嗎？我願意轉化你，可是你得先想清楚。

original: You'd become the very thing you've sworn to destroy. I don't know how the Dawnguard will react.
string: 你會成為你曾經發誓要消滅的東西。我不曉得暮光守衛會作何反應。

original: Those are my only options?
string: 我只有這兩個選擇嗎？

original: I'm sorry. I wish I knew a better way, something that would be easier for you.
string: 我很抱歉。我希望我知道別的方法，一個對你而言比較容易的方法。

original: Just know that... whatever path you choose, I won't think any less of you. Sometimes things just have to be done.
string: 記得，不論你選擇哪一條路，我都不會看不起你。有時候某些事情你不管願不願意都得去做。

original: I know that better than anybody.
string: 這我比任何人都還要清楚。

original: There has to be another way.
string: 一定有別的方法。

original: Maybe.
string: 也許吧。

original: We could just "pay the toll" another way. It wants a soul, so we give it a soul. Yours.
string: 我們可以用別的方式「付入場費」。它想要靈魂，我們就給它靈魂。就給它你的好了。

original: Are you saying that I need to become a vampire?
string: 妳是說我得要變成吸血鬼嗎？

original: Not your first choice, I'd guess.
string: 我猜那不是你想要的方法。

original: So there's no way in, then.
string: 所以我們沒辦法進去了。

original: There might be, but I don't think you're going to like it.
string: 也許有，但是我不認為你聽了會喜歡。

original: Vampires aren't counted among the living. I could probably go through there without a problem.
string: 吸血鬼不會被它視為活人。我應該可以毫無阻礙通過。

original: It was. What happened?
string: 真的很痛。剛才發生什麼事了？

original: Now that I think about it... I should have expected that. Sorry.
string: 仔細想想......我早該猜到會這樣的。抱歉。

original: It's hard to describe. The Soul Cairn is... well, hungry, for lack of a better word. It's trying to take your life essence as payment.
string: 這很難形容。靈魂石塚......很飢餓。我想不出更好的形容了。所以，它試著吸取你的生命精華當「入場費」。

original: That hurt.
string: 好痛啊。

original: Are you alright? That looked painful.
string: 你還好嗎？那看起來很痛。

original: Can you tell me more about the old Dawnguard?
string: 你可以告訴我暮光守衛的故事嗎？

original: Only what I've heard.
string: 我這些都是聽來的。

original: Back in the Second Era, the Jarl of Riften had a son. Adventurous type, too much for his own good it seems.
string: 第二紀元時，裂谷城的領主有個兒子。是個喜愛冒險的人，事後證明他可能喜愛冒險過頭了。

original: Wound up turning into a vampire. The Jarl, unable to kill his own son, spent a fortune building this keep and hiring men to guard it.
string: 他被變成吸血鬼，但領主下不了手殺死自己的兒子，所以花了大筆金錢蓋了這座堡壘，然後雇人來看守。

original: Their job was to keep the Jarl's son contained within. They took it seriously, and served honorably.
string: 他們的任務是把領主的兒子留在裡面。他們了解這重要性，也不負所託。

original: They were eventually forced to put him down. The Jarl banished them from the hold, but they stuck to their cause.
string: 最後他們被迫得要殺死領主的兒子。但領主卻因此把他們從堡壘驅逐出去。事後他們仍堅守最初的使命。

original: Fought vampires wherever they found them. I aim to continue that mission.
string: 四處找尋並獵殺吸血鬼。我的目的是延續那使命。

original: Can you teach me how to make a crossbow?
string: 妳可以教我如何製造一把石弩嗎？

original: A basic one? Of course. That is, assuming you know anything about steel smithing. It's pretty simple.
string: 基本的嗎？當然可以。只要你具備一般的鑄造知識就行了。很簡單。

original: Talk to Gunmar if you need materials.
string: 如果你需要材料的話就去找岡馬吧。

original: Someone is here. Find them!
string: 這裡有外人。快找出來！

original: I will find you. Then you will beg me to let you die.
string: 我會把你找出來。到時候你會求我殺了你。

original: Harkon will reward us richly for this.
string: 赫岡肯定會為此給我們豐富的獎賞。

original: I've waited a long time for my chance to move up in the court.
string: 我可是等了好長一段時間才等到這個升官機會。

original: I thought Lokil knew what he was doing. This is taking too long.
string: 我以為洛基爾知道該怎麼做。真的太慢了。

original: Jeron was furious to be left guarding the door.
string: 捷倫被派去守門時大怒。

original: Arvak!
string: 阿瓦克！

original: Arvak, please! You can stop running now!
string: 阿瓦克，拜託！你不用繼續跑了！

original: Arvak?
string: 阿瓦克？

original: What exactly are we looking for?
string: 我們到底是在找什麼？

original: My mother was meticulous about her research. If we can find her notes, there might be some hints in there.
string: 我母親的研究很詳細。要是我們可以找到她的日記，裡頭可能會有線索。

original: Ideas?
string: 有什麼點子嗎？

original: Let's take a look around. There has to be something here that tells us where she's gone.
string: 我們四處看看。這裡一定有線索告訴我們她去哪了。

original: I'm not sure about this circle, but it's obviously... something.
string: 這個圓圈應該有它的作用，但我不是很確定。

original: I knew she was deep into necromancy. I mean, she taught me everything I know.
string: 我知道她很投入死靈法術的研究之中。所有我知道的一切都是她教我的。

original: But I had no idea she had a setup like this.
string: 但我不曉得她建了這個設施。

original: I don't want to become a vampire. I refuse your gift.
string: 我不要成為吸血鬼。我拒絕你的禮物。

original: So be it!
string: 如你所願！

original: I will accept your gift and become a vampire.
string: 我願意接受你的禮物，變成吸血鬼。

original: Be still!
string: 別動！

original: And if I refuse your gift?
string: 要是我拒絕你的禮物呢？

original: Then you will be prey, like all mortals. I will spare your life this once, but you will be banished from this hall.
string: 那你就會成為獵物，如同所有其他凡人。我這次先饒你一條命，但你得要立刻離開這座大廳。

original: There is but one gift I can give that is equal in value to the Elder Scroll and my daughter.
string: 我可以給你一份禮物，價值相當於上古卷軸或我的女兒。

original: I offer you my blood. Take it, and you will walk as a lion among sheep. Men will tremble at your approach, and you will never fear death again.
string: 我願意賜予你我的血。接受了，凡人就是你的食物。人們看到你會顫抖。你再也不需畏懼死亡。

original: You're vampires.
string: 你們是吸血鬼。

original: Not just vampires. We are among the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim.
string: 不是一般的吸血鬼。我們是天際省最古老、最強大的吸血鬼。

original: I'm <Alias=Player>. Who are you?
string: 我是<Alias=Player>。你是誰？

original: I am Harkon, lord of this court.
string: 我是赫岡，這座宮殿的主人。

original: By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
string: 我的女兒應該也經告訴過你，我們是什麼了。

original: Look at this place. This has to be it!
string: 看看這地方。一定就是這了！

original: DLC1VQ04Hellos
string: DLC1VQ04Hellos

original: Let's go. My mother must be waiting on the other side of that thing.
string: 我們走吧。我媽應該在這玩意的另一頭等著我們。

original: Have you made up your mind?
string: 你做好決定了嗎？

original: Incredible. Simply incredible.
string: 不可思議。真是太不可思議了。

original: Get the ingredients in the vessel and let me know when you're ready.
string: 把材料放進容器裡，準備好就跟我說。

original: Having trouble finding those ingredients?
string: 找不到材料嗎？

original: Any luck yet?
string: 找到了嗎？

original: Keep searching for her notes. She probably had a journal or something.
string: 繼續試著找她的筆記。她應該有本日記之類的。

original: I can't even begin to imagine how much time she spent in this room. Doesn't look too cozy.
string: 我完全無法想像她花了多少時間在這房間內。看起來不是很舒適。

original: We're getting close. I'm sure of it.
string: 我們很接近了。我很確定。

original: If we had the crests, we wouldn't have to keep hanging around this lovely place.
string: 要是我們有月亮雕飾的話，就不需要繼續在這個地方逗留了。

original: I'm telling you, there's something strange with the moondial.
string: 我跟你說，這個月相盤有點古怪。

original: Yes? What did you need?
string: 嗯？你需要什麼？

original: True. But I know a way we can get to the courtyard without arousing suspicion.
string: 沒錯，但是我知道如何在不引起注意的情況下進入庭院。

original: They aren't going to let us use the front door.
string: 他們可不會敞開大門讓我們進去。

original: Trust me. I lived here for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
string: 相信我。我在這裡住過很長一段時間，對這裡瞭若指掌。

original: How can we get in without your father noticing?
string: 我們要怎麼進去才不會不引起妳父親的注意？

original: Trust me. I lived in that castle for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
string: 相信我。我在這裡住過很長一段時間，什麼細節都知道。

original: How can we get in without your father noticing?
string: 我們要怎麼進去才不會不引起妳父親的注意？

original: Hiding with the Dawnguard?
string: 她藏身在暮光守衛當中？

original: They'd be even less welcoming to her than they've been to me. It would have been a bloodbath.
string: 他們對她應該比對我還要來得不友善。應該會演變成流血衝突吧。

original: And since the Dawnguard are still around, that must not have happened.
string: 既然暮光守衛都還活著，事情應該就不是那樣發展的。

original: Any other ideas?
string: 有別的想法嗎？

original: I doubt my mother would waste her time with those fools.
string: 我覺得我媽不會浪費時間在那些傻子身上。

original: They probably would have tried to kill her, and that has a way of souring relationships.
string: 他們應該會試著殺了她。你說這樣兩者之間怎麼可能建立什麼良好的關係。

original: Any other ideas?
string: 有別的想法嗎？

original: Besides, I can't imagine a single place my father would avoid looking. And he's had all this time, too.
string: 而且，我父親應該不會放過任何小細節。何況他還花了這麼長的時間在找。

original: Any ideas?
string: 有任何提議嗎？

original: Sounds like she was being cautious.
string: 聽起來她只是很小心。

original: Maybe.
string: 也許吧。

original: What I can't figure out is why she said it that way.
string: 我只是不懂她為何那樣說。

original: You said you didn't know where she went.
string: 妳不是說妳不知道她去哪了嗎？

original: The last time I saw her, she said that she'd go somewhere safe... somewhere that my father would never search.
string: 我最後一次看到她的時候，她說她要去一個安全的地方......一個我父親不可能會去找的地方。

original: Other than that, she wouldn't tell me anything.
string: 除此之外，她什麼也不願意跟我說。

original: But the way she said it... "someplace he would never search." It was cryptic, yet she called attention to it.
string: 但是她表達的方式......「不可能會去找的地方。」她沒有明講，不過有在暗示。

original: Do you trust Harkon at all?
string: 妳一點都不信任赫岡吧？

original: It's not a question of trust... he's just obsessed with the prophecy.
string: 這無關信任......他完全被預言給迷住了。

original: And from what I could tell, a thousand extra years of obsession haven't made him any better. We should have found him a hobby.
string: 就我所知，沉迷幾千年的時間完全沒有讓他好轉。我們當初應該幫他找個嗜好才對。

original: Why didn't you say something earlier?
string: 妳怎麼之前沒說？

original: Didn't want that lot getting wind of it. Especially my father.
string: 我不想讓其他人知道，尤其是我的父親。

original: Half the people in your little crew would just as soon kill me as talk to me.
string: 你們這幫人中大概有一半的人寧可殺了我也不願意跟我說話。

original: That doesn't exactly make me want to open up.
string: 我不願意敞開心胸是有原因的。

original: I got a warmer welcome from my father, and that's saying something.
string: 連我爸歡迎我的方式都比這溫暖，這樣說你懂了吧。

original: Are you trying to get my attention?
string: 你想吸引我的注意力嗎？

original: Do you have a moment to talk?
string: 你有時間和我談談嗎？

original: Yes… master…
string: 是的？主人？

original: Yes, I can feel your defenses crumbling. You want it to end. You want to give in to me.
string: 是的，我感覺到你的抵抗力在衰退。你想放棄了。你想要臣服於我。

original: Now, acknowledge me as your master!
string: 現在，宣示你的效忠！

original: Must... resist...
How much longer can you keep this up, Moth Priest?
string: 你還可以支撐多久呢，先祖蛾祭司？

original: Your mind was strong, but you're exhausted from the struggle.
string: 你的意志很強，但是掙扎那麼久也累了。

original: I will resist you, monster. I must!
string: 我會抵抗你的，怪物。我一定要抵抗！

original: The more you fight me, the more you will suffer, mortal.
string: 你越抵抗會越痛苦，凡人。

original: I'm working on it, now give me some silence so I can think.
string: 我還在想。安靜些讓我好好思考吧。

original: How do we do that?
string: 要怎麼救他呢？

original: I don't know, maybe. Won't know until we get him out of there.
string: 我不知道，也許吧。我們要把他救出來才知道。

original: You think they turned him?
string: 你覺得他們把他變成吸血鬼了嗎？

original: I just hope we weren't too late.
string: 希望我們沒有來得太遲。

original: I'm not sure what they did to this Moth Priest, but he doesn't look right.
string: 我不清楚他們對先祖蛾祭司做了什麼，但是他看起來狀況不太好。

original: Those vampires put up a hell of a fight.
string: 這些吸血鬼可真難纏。

original: Farewell, and good journey milord.
string: 再會，祝旅途平安，大人。

original: Farewell, and good journey milady.
string: 再會，祝旅途平安，女士。

original: Thank you for breaking that foul vampire's hold over me.
string: 謝謝你把我從那隻邪惡的吸血鬼的控制中解救出來。

original: That... that wasn't me you were fighting.
string: 跟......跟你戰鬥的不是我。

original: I could see through my eyes, but I could not control my actions.
string: 我可以透過我的眼睛看，但是我無法控制我的行為。

original: Wait, stop! I yield!
string: 等等！停下來！我投降！

original: Are you alright? Come on, we can do this. I know we can.
string: 你沒事吧？來吧，我們可以的。我們一定可以。

original: Yes, they smell like trolls. But do you have to? Consider washing up a bit more often.
string: 對啊，牠們聞起來像巨魔。但是你幹嘛學牠們？沒事多洗澡吧。

original: They're trolls. They smell like trolls. I can't help that either.
string: 牠們是巨魔。聞起來當然就像巨魔。我也沒辦法。

original: I'd also like to not have to smell troll all the time.
string: 我也不希望我總是聞到巨魔的味道。

original: I can't help that space is cramped in here, Florentius.
string: 這裡那麼擠我也沒辦法，佛羅倫提。

original: I'd like to be able to make a potion without tasting iron flakes, you know?
string: 真希望我能做出一灌喝起來沒有鐵鏽味的藥水。

original: Very funny.
string: 真幽默。

original: I don't know how you do it, getting them into that pen and putting armor on them. A very special relationship, clearly.
string: 真不知道你是怎麼辦到的，讓牠們乖乖進到籠子裡，還讓你替牠們穿上盔甲。你們的關係很特別喔。

original: What?
string: 什麼？

original: Why the trolls, of course! You seem to have quite a way with them.
string: 當然是那些巨魔啊！我看牠們都很聽你的話。

original: Which friends would those be?
string: 哪些朋友？

original: How are your friends?
string: 你的朋友過得如何？

original: Do you know anything about the old Dawnguard?
string: 關於從前的暮光守衛，妳知道些什麼？

original: I've only heard stories. Not sure if any of them are true.
string: 我只聽過一些傳聞。正確性我就不清楚了。

original: Like that they were supposed to guard some vampire here, but wound up all becoming vampires themselves when they saw how powerful he was.
string: 聽說他們應該要在這裡看守某隻吸血鬼，但後來當他們見識到他的力量後，全都選擇成為吸血鬼了。

original: And then preyed on the Rift until finally someone put them down.
string: 接下來他們開始襲擊裂痕領，直到有人出面擊垮他們。

original: I guess it doesn't matter now. At least Isran is trying to do something noble with the name.
string: 以前的事現在也不重要了。至少伊士冉試著用那名字做些好事。

original: Do you know anything about the old Dawnguard?
string: 關於從前的暮光守衛，你都知道些什麼？

original: Oh, I've read a few things. Heard a few more things. Arkay's told me a bit as well.
string: 喔，我聽過一些事。後來又聽到一些別的。阿爾凱也有跟我說一些。

original: The story they'd like you to believe is that they were such a noble bunch, doing the honorable thing and saving lives.
string: 他們想要讓你以為他們是一群高尚的傢伙，做一些高尚的事情，拯救人之類的。

original: Only I hear that's not quite how it happened. Secret organization, you see. No one to blame when homes are broken into, things stolen.
string: 只是根據我聽到的，不完全是那樣。是個神秘的組織，你懂了吧？會闖進別人家裡搶東西、偷東西。

original: Heard they'd go on midnight raids, pillaging and looting, and then stash the spoils somewhere, guarded by their sigil.
string: 聽說他們都趁午夜偷襲、掠奪、搶劫。然後把搶來的東西藏起來用印記保護著。

original: Arkay tells me the Sun Fire spell can break open those caches, but I've never found one. I think he might be lying to me.
string: 阿爾凱跟我說豔陽之火可以打開那些儲藏箱，但我從沒找到過。也許我被他騙了。

original: Sorine and Gunmar are settling in.
string: 索琳跟岡馬正要安頓下來。

original: Glad to see you've taken care of your little problem, and kept it from becoming my problem.
string: 真高興看到你處理好自己的問題，同時不讓它成為我的問題。

original: Welcome back.
string: 歡迎回來。

original: I'll be waiting.
string: 我會等你的。

original: If you can manage that, the Dawnguard still may have use for you.
string: 如果你辦得到的話，或許暮光守衛會需要你。

original: Go to Morthal and find Falion. He's the only one I know of in Skyrim that can cure vampirism.
string: 去墨索爾找法利昂。他是我知道全天際省唯一會治療吸血鬼病的人。

original: And so I'm going to give you a chance to get yourself cured.
string: 我願意給你一次被治癒的機會。

original: Since you could've attacked me before now, I'm going to assume this was a little accident on your part.
string: 既然你之前有機會攻擊我但沒那麼做，我想這次就當作是意外好了。

original: And it seems we have a problem.
string: 看來我們有個問題。

original: What will you do now?
string: 你現在要做什麼？

original: Well, I think it's time I got back to my work as an alchemist.
string: 嗯，也許我該回去當我的鍊金師。

original: The Soul Cairn will offer a unique opportunity to continue my studies, and I intend to complete my research.
string: 靈魂石塚給我機會延續我的研究，我也打算去完成。

original: In the meantime, if there are any potions you might need, feel free to help yourself.
string: 你有需要藥水的話，請自便。

original: Can you give me Bloodcursed Arrows?
string: 你可以給我血咒箭嗎？

original: I'm sorry, I don't feel comfortable giving them to you.
string: 對不起，我不放心把它們交給你。

original: I understand what you did for Serana and for me, but the prophecy never sat well for me, and I don't want to be a part of it. I'm sorry.
string: 我了解你為了我還有瑟拉娜做的事情。但是我一直不喜歡那預言，我也不想參與其中。抱歉了。

original: Oh, gods...
That many fewer vampires to worry about. Good work.
string: 以後可以少擔心一些吸血鬼了。做得好。

original: Isran will never admit it, but I'm sure he's proud of you.
string: 伊士冉可能永遠不會承認，但我相信他以你為榮。

original: Good thing we stopped that prophecy, huh?
string: 幸好我們阻止了預言，對吧？

original: I really do enjoy killing vampires.
string: 我真的很喜歡殺吸血鬼。

original: Another victory for the Dawnguard.
string: 暮光守衛再次獲勝。

original: Harkon's short-sightedness was his undoing. In his lust for power, he failed to consider the full consequences of his plans.
string: 赫岡的目光過於短淺導致他失敗。他被權力的慾望給蒙蔽了，無法仔細思量他那些計劃的後果。

original: Can you imagine it? A world without a sun... we would all have been doomed, vampires and men alike.
string: 你能想像嗎？沒有太陽的世界。那會是我們全部人的末日，不管是人還是吸血鬼。

original: Once again, the Elder Scrolls have proven their value.
string: 上古卷軸再次證明了其價值。

original: Congratulations, friend. You've won a well-deserved victory here.
string: 恭喜你，老朋友。你的勝利當之無愧。

original: The people of Skyrim owe you a great deal, whether they know it or not.
string: 天際省的居民們虧欠你很多，只是他們可能都不知道。

original: Shall we continue the fight?
string: 我們要繼續打嗎？

original: I knew you had it in you! Arkay wasn't so sure. Between you and me, I think he didn't expect you to make it.
string: 我就知道你很可靠。阿爾凱對你就沒那麼有信心了。偷偷跟你說，他原本不認為你會成功的。

original: But not me! I knew it all along!
string: 但是我可沒那麼想！我自始至終都相信你。

original: Is that what passes for security with your lot? I can't say that I'm feeling any more confident.
string: 你這裡一點都不安全啊？我真的要沒信心了。

original: I don't want to either, but you're going to have to jump. I'll be... right behind you. Above you. Just go.
string: 我也不想啊，但是你一定要跳。我會在你後面，不對，是上面。你走就是了。

original: Is that... oh no. Are we going down there?
string: 那是......喔不。我們真的要下去嗎？

original: I'm not going to take your blood right now.
string: 我不打算現在借用妳的血。

original: Oh. All right, then.
string: 喔。好吧。

original: I'd like to treat some arrows with your blood.
string: 我想要把妳的血塗在我的箭上。

original: I think you'll need to find some arrows, first. Only elven ones will work for this, remember?
string: 你得先找到幾支箭。要精靈箭才管用，記得吧？

original: Let's just get this over with.
string: 我們趕快搞定吧。

original: Just... try to make it quick.
string: 你......快點就好。

original: You're a Daughter of Coldharbour.
string: 妳是冷港之女。

original: So I am. I guess we could use my blood. Do you have any arrows? Elven arrows. I'm not going to just bleed on any old thing.
string: 沒錯，我們可以用我的血液。你身上有箭嗎？必須是精靈的，我可不打算把我的血用在隨便一支箭上。

original: That I am. So I'm guessing you want to just use my blood, then?
string: 我是。所以你只是想用我的血？

original: Let's just get this over with. Do you have any elven arrows?
string: 要就快吧。你有精靈箭嗎？

original: Can I use your blood, then?
string: 那麼，我可以用妳的血液嗎？

original: If you were anybody else, I'd probably be taking some blood from you for asking that.
string: 如果你是別人的話，光是那樣問，我可能就會吸乾你的血了。

original: You wouldn't like it.
string: 你不會喜歡的。

original: But I can see this having its uses. Do you have any elven arrows on you?
string: 我看得出來這有好處。你身上有精靈箭嗎？

original: Sure... do you have any arrows, though? They would have to be of elven quality, I'd guess.
string: 當然可以......但你身上有箭嗎？必須是精靈箭才行喔。

original: Vyrthur was saying something about vampire blood and the bow...
string: 烏叔爾剛才說了有關吸血鬼的血還有弓的事......

original: It sounds like... that's the last bit of the prophecy. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour can corrupt the bow.
string: 那聽起來像是......預言的最後一段。冷港之女的血可以汙染弓。

original: Nevermind, I don't need you to do anything right now.
string: 沒關係。我現在不需要你做任何事情。

original: (Growl)
string: （咆哮）

original: Let me show you what I need.
string: 讓我給你看我需要什麼。

original: (Bark)
string: （犬吠）

original: (Panting)
string: （喘氣）

original: I need you to do something for me.
string: 我需要你為我做件事情。

original: (Bark)
string: （犬吠）

original: Follow me.
string: 跟我來。

original: (Bark)
string: （犬吠）

original: Time for you to head home.
string: 你該回家了。

original: (Whine)
string: （哀嚎）

original: Give me everything you are carrying.
string: 把你背的東西都給我

original: (Bark)
string: （犬吠）

original: Wait here.
string: 在這裡等著。

original: (Whine)
string: （哀嚎）

original: The... Empire. From Cyrodiil.
string: 就是......帝國啊。從賽瑞迪爾來的。

original: Cyrodiil is the seat of an empire?
string: 賽瑞迪爾成了帝國的核心？

original: I must have been gone longer than I thought. Definitely longer than we planned.
string: 我離開的時間比我想像的還要久。絕對比原本計劃的要久很多。

original: Please, let's hurry. I need to get home so I can figure out what's happened.
string: 拜託你快點。我得趕回家才知道發生了什麼事。

original: Empire? What... what empire?
string: 帝國？什麼帝國？

original: Look out! Gargoyles!
string: 小心！石像鬼！

original: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
string: 我不了解那是什麼意思。但是我們得找到答案。她身上應該有吸血鬼想要的東西，或是自己本身就很重要。

original: The Empire supports Elisif, but there are many in Skyrim loyal to Ulfric.
string: 帝國支持艾利西弗，但是天際省有很多人效忠烏弗瑞克。

original: The Empire supports Elisif, and killed Ulfric for his rebellion.
string: 帝國支持艾利西弗，並且為了造反一事處決了烏弗瑞克。

original: The Empire supported Elisif, but Ulfric now controls Skyrim.
string: 帝國支持艾利西弗，但是天際省目前被烏弗瑞克統治。

original: Elisif of Solitude will be High Queen.
string: 獨孤城的艾利西弗將會是至高王。

original: I don't know that name. You say she's Jarl of Solitude? Who supports her?
string: 我沒聽過這個名字。你說她是獨孤城的領主？有誰支持她？

original: Ulfric Stormcloak is the true High King.
string: 烏弗瑞克是真的至高王。

original: I've... never heard of him. Is he well supported?
string: 我......從沒聽過這名字。很多人支持他嗎？

original: That's actually a matter for debate.
string: 這問題有待討論。

original: Oh, wonderful. A war of succession. Good to know the world didn't get boring while I was gone.
string: 喔，太美好了。爭奪王位之戰。我很高興我不在的這段期間世界沒有變得太無趣。

original: Who are the contenders?
string: 競爭者有誰？

original: I wonder if the horse's remains are around here... someplace.
string: 馬的屍體應該在這裡的......某處。

original: That's it. That's the last scroll.
string: 成功了，那是最後一部卷軸。

original: Come on, let's take it to Dexion.
string: 來吧，拿去給戴希翁。

original: I don't think they'll involve you.
string: 我想那些冒險應該和妳無關。

original: Suit yourself.
string: 隨你便吧。

original: You know where to find me if you change your mind.
string: 你改變心意的話，知道哪裡可以找到我。

original: I'd love to have you along.
string: 我想要妳一起參與。

original: That's what I wanted to hear.
string: 這正是我想聽的。

original: If you need some help, I'm ready.
string: 如果你需要幫助的話，我準備好了。

original: Of course, if you've got any more adventures planned...
string: 當然啦，或許你打算踏上新的冒險旅程......

original: I'll probably stay here, for as long as they'll let me.
string: 我會留在這裡吧，直到他們要趕我走為止。

original: I think we can rebuild here. Make my family's legacy something more respectable.
string: 我想我們可以重建這個地方，讓我家族的名望重新獲得尊重。

original: I'll probably stay with the Dawnguard, for as long as they'll let me.
string: 我大概會跟著暮光守衛，直到他們要把我趕走為止。

original: They're respectable fighters, and I think they see the benefits of having a vampire on their side, now.
string: 他們是可敬的戰士。而且我想他們現在也很明白，有吸血鬼跟他們同一國會帶來哪些好處。

original: What will you do now?
string: 妳接下來要做什麼？

original: I'm not sure.
string: 我不確定。

original: Anyway, this is all very touching, but don't we have some more important things to worry about right now?
string: 總之，我知道這一切很感人，但是我們沒有更重要的事情需要去煩惱嗎？

original: I'm used to a little more quiet on my journeys.
string: 我習慣旅途中可以安靜些。

original: Well, I'll be out of your hair soon enough.
string: 那你再忍耐一下吧，我很快就不會再煩你了。

original: I'm glad you're with me.
string: 我很高興有妳的陪伴。

original: Me too.
string: 我也是。

original: We're not close anymore.
string: 我們沒有以前那麼親近了。

original: That's too bad.
string: 真是糟糕。

original: You deserve to be happy.
string: 你值得快樂。

original: We have a happy life together.
string: 我們在一起很快樂。

original: Good. You deserve that much.
string: 很好。那是你應得的。

original: I have lots of friends.
string: 我有很多朋友。

original: Well, I guess now you have one more.
string: 嗯，那我想你現在比原本多了一個朋友。

original: I try not to rely on others.
string: 我試著不依賴他人。

original: Does it bother you that I'm here?
string: 那我在這裡你會不開心嗎？

original: There's my wife...
string: 我結婚了......

original: Oh. I didn't even know. What kind of woman is she?
string: 喔。我完全不知道。她是一個怎樣的女人？

original: Oh. I didn't even know. What kind of man is he?
string: 喔。我完全不知道。他是一個怎樣的男人？

original: There's my husband...
string: 我結婚了......

original: Oh. I didn't even know. Is it a happy home?
string: 喔。我完全不知道。你們的婚姻美滿嗎？

original: I'm married. (Lie)
string: 我結婚了。（撒謊）

original: You mean, do I get lonely?
string: 妳是說，我會感到孤單嗎？

original: Yeah. Is it just you, or do you have... people in your life?
string: 對啊。你是一個人嗎？還是你生命中有......別人？

original: What about me?
string: 我怎麼樣？

original: Do you get lonely?
string: 你會感到孤單嗎？

original: Are there... people in your life?
string: 你生命中有......別人嗎？

original: But... what about you?
Your parents didn't make it easy on you.
string: 妳的父母沒有讓妳太好過。

original: No, they didn't. But that's why I like being out here with you.
string: 對啊，我知道。所有我才那麼喜歡跟你在外頭亂跑。

original: Do you still feel that way?
string: 妳現在還會孤單嗎？

original: A little bit. That's... one of the reasons I wanted to come with you.
string: 有點。那是......其中一個我想要跟你一起走的原因。

original: You talk about being lonely a lot.
string: 妳以前好像常常只有一個人。

original: Well, growing up the way I did, you get used to it.
string: 嗯，你要是像我一樣長大，就會習慣了。

original: Do you ever feel lonely?
string: 你會感到孤單嗎？

original: Come on, the bow has to be in this valley somewhere.
string: 走吧，弓應該就在這個山谷裡的某處。

original: Let me know if you need anything.
string: 妳需要什麼就跟我說。

original: We've got enough to worry about right now. You stay focused, and I'll worry about me.
string: 我們有很多事情需要擔心。你要保持專注，我會顧好自己。

original: That's a good way to be thinking.
string: 很正面的想法。

original: I know you didn't know your parents. But if they were anything like mine, you're better off.
string: 我知道你不認識自己的父母。但要是他們像我的父母的話，你還是別認識的好。

original: I think both of our parents have failed us. Just you and me against the world, now.
string: 我覺得我們的父母都讓我們失望了。現在是你我一起對抗整個世界。

original: We didn't all get to have parents like yours. Sometimes this is just... how it is.
string: 不是每個人的父母都像你的那樣。有時候......只能設法接受。

original: I hope so.
string: 應該吧。

original: Are you ready to do this?
string: 妳準備好了嗎？

original: I don't think you can ever be ready to kill your parent.
string: 我不認為有誰能做好殺死父母的心理準備。

original: I'm doing my best to not think of him as my father anymore.
string: 我會努力不再把他當我父親看。

original: Just... leave me alone for now. I'll be fine.
string: 讓我一個人靜一下。我不會有事的。

original: Come on. We can talk about this another time.
string: 拜託。我們下次再說吧。

original: As long as you're ready to kill him, that's all that matters.
string: 妳準備好殺死他了嗎？那才是最重要的。

original: You... always say what you think, don't you?
string: 你......你講話都這麼直接嗎？

original: I don't like him any more than you do. But he is my father.
string: 我跟你一樣都不喜歡他。可是他是我父親。

original: I'm getting there. Making my peace with it.
string: 我還在調適自己，說服自己那是必要的。

original: Will it be hard for you if we have to kill him?
string: 如果我們得要殺了他，妳做得到嗎？

original: If? I've been assuming that's where all this is going.
string: 如果？我以為那勢在必行。

original: I've been trying to make my peace with it.
string: 我一直試著讓自己習慣那想法。

original: Then we'll have to take care of him.
string: 那我們就得想辦法處理掉他。

original: Not until we have the bow. But... you're right.
string: 先拿到弓再說。但是......你說得沒錯。

original: This won't be easy. But we can handle it.
string: 肯定不簡單。但是我們辦得到。

original: So what do we do?
string: 我們該怎麼做？

original: I think you know.
string: 你自己很清楚。

original: We both know what's going to have to happen once we find the bow.
string: 我們都知道一旦我們找到弓之後，接著要做什麼。

original: Keep strong, and eyes open. We're on a different path now.
string: 保持堅強，眼睛睜大。接下來的路只會更辛苦。

original: You think he'll try to kill us?
string: 妳覺得他會試著殺掉我們嗎？

original: You'll have shown yourself to be strong, which means you can't be allowed to just stick around.
string: 你到時候會證明自已的強大。這代表他不可能讓你留下。

original: And I'll be unnecessary once he has it.
string: 而我則會失去利用價值。

original: I've proven my value to him.
string: 我會證明自己的價值給他看。

original: No, you've proven your strength to him.
string: 不，你已經向他展示了你的力量。

original: Which just makes you a more dangerous rival.
string: 你只會變成更加危險的敵手。

original: He won't need either of us anymore.
string: 他屆時將不需要我們倆任何一個人。

original: We'll celebrate our victory.
string: 我們會慶祝我們的勝利。

original: And I thought my father was the delusional one.
string: 你比我父親還會幻想。

original: At that point, you'll have given him everything he's ever wanted.
string: 屆時，你會把他這輩子的夢想都交給他。

original: He'll want to use it.
string: 他會想要使用它。

original: Of course he will.
string: 他當然會。

original: But at that point, he'll have everything he's ever wanted.
string: 但是到了那時候，他想要的東西全都拿到手了。

original: This isn't going to end well, is it?
string: 不會有好結局，對吧？

original: No, it's probably not.
string: 應該不會有。

original: I mean, what do you think my father will do when we bring him the bow?
string: 我是說，如果我們把弓拿給我父親，你覺得他會做什麼？

original: Why would it matter more to me?
string: 為什麼對我來說來較有差？

original: Don't tell me you're that naive.
string: 我不相信你有那麼天真。

original: Really?
string: 真的嗎？

original: Oh, wow. All right, well, what do you think my father's going to do once we bring the bow to him?
string: 喔，好吧，那你覺得我父親拿到弓之後會做什麼？

original: Does it bother you that we're working with your father?
string: 妳不在意我們跟妳父親合作嗎？

original: I can't say it surprises me. I kind of figured we were heading for this some day.
string: 我其實不太驚訝。我知道我們一直是朝著這方向前進。

original: I just didn't know when.
string: 我只是不知道這天什麼時候會到來。

original: Does it bother you that we're working against your father?
string: 妳不在意跟我一起共同對抗妳的父親嗎？

original: I figured it would be more of an issue for you.
string: 我想對你來說差別比較大。

original: No, but we're all better off this way.
string: 這對大家都好。

original: That makes sense.
string: 很合理。

original: Nobody hears from them much anymore.
string: 沒人知道他們的消息。

original: Oh. I... I see.
That's too bad.
string: 真是太糟了。

original: It is.
string: 是啊。

original: Do you still feel lonely?
string: 妳還感到孤單嗎？

original: Not as much.
string: 好點了。

original: I try.
string: 我在試了。

original: Yeah.
string: 好啊。

original: It's fine.
string: 沒關係的。

original: Let's... uh... let's just keep going.
string: 那麼我們......繼續走吧。

original: We should keep moving.
string: 我們該繼續前進。

original: Right behind you.
string: 我跟著你走。

original: We're very close. I can't wait to see them again.
string: 我們的關係很親密。我等不及再見到他們。

original: You're a good son.
string: 你是個好兒子。

original: You're a good daughter.
string: 妳是個好女兒。

original: I never knew them. I grew up alone.
string: 我從來沒見過他們。我是一個人長大的。

original: I know how that feels. I mean... I know it isn't the same thing. But I was a pretty lonely child, myself.
string: 我了解這種感覺。我是說......我知道情況跟你的不一樣。但是我自己小時候也很孤單。

original: We didn't really get along. Best that I haven't seen them in a while.
string: 我們合不來。幸好我很久沒看到他們了。

original: That's too bad. Do you know how they're doing now?
string: 好糟糕。你知道他們的近況嗎？

original: They were good people. I miss them.
string: 他們已經離開人世了。我很想念他們。

original: Oh, I'm sorry. Didn't mean to bring up a bad memory.
string: 真的很抱歉。我不是故意要喚起你傷心的回憶。

original: What about you? What were your parents like?
string: 那你呢？你的父母是怎樣的人？

original: It sounds like you don't like either of them very much.
string: 聽起來妳的父母妳都不太喜歡。

original: It's not that simple. I guess it never is with families, is it?
string: 這事沒那麼簡單。家裡的事總是一言難盡，你說對不對？

original: Were you close with them?
string: 妳跟他們很親近嗎？

original: My father... no, not really. I did spend a lot of time with my mother, but she saw me more like a protege than a daughter.
string: 我跟我的父親......沒有很親近。而雖然我常常跟我母親相處在一起，但是她總是把我當門徒看待，而不是女兒。

original: You've met both of my parents. They're both crazy in their own way.
string: 我的父母你都見過了。他們兩人瘋狂的地方都不太一樣。

original: You've already seen my father's obsession. My mother's not a whole lot better, but you'll see that soon enough.
string: 你已經見識到我父親的執著了。我的母親也沒好多少。你很快就會知道了。

original: Tell me about your family.
string: 跟我聊聊妳的家人。

original: There's not a whole lot to tell.
string: 其實沒什麼好說的

original: I don't think I can help you with this.
string: 這方面我可能幫不了妳。

original: Very supportive.
string: 真是謝謝你啊。

original: I understand.
string: 我懂了。

original: If you want to cure yourself, I'll support you.
string: 如果妳想被治癒的話，我會支持妳。

original: I'll speak to Falion. I've heard he knows about these things.
string: 我會跟法利昂談談。聽說他有辦法。

original: I'm going to go away for a while. I'll meet you back home when I'm done.
string: 我要離開一陣子。我完事後再跟你在家裡碰面。

original: I think I'd feel more comfortable.
string: 妳如果變正常了，我會感覺較自在。

original: So you take a major decision for me, and make it all about you?
string: 所以你替我做了一個重大的決定，然後考量的點都是你自己的？

original: Forget it.
string: 算了吧。

original: You could be your own person again.
string: 妳可以重新當個正常人。

original: It would be nice not to always be so thirsty.
string: 不用總是感到口渴應該很不錯。

original: Look what it did to your family.
string: 妳看吸血鬼病對妳的家庭造成的影響。

original: Even before that, we weren't the most normal family. We did worship a daedra, remember?
string: 在那發生之前我們就不是很正常的家庭了。我們崇拜魔侯，還記得嗎？

original: This matters to me.
string: 我在乎。

original: Of course it matters to you, but you don't get to make this decision for me.
string: 你當然在乎，但是你不能替我做決定。

original: I can see that. This has been my life for a long time, though. Do you understand that much?
string: 我了解，但這是我的生命。你懂嗎？

original: I shouldn't have brought it up again.
string: 我不應該重新提起的。

original: Probably not.
string: 應該吧。

original: I can tell this is important to you. Would you... do you want me to be just a normal human?
string: 我知道這對你來說很重要。你願意......你想要我當個普通人就好嗎？

original: Sorry, I'll drop it.
string: 抱歉，我不說了。

original: It's fine, it can just be kind of a sore subject.
string: 沒關係，只是這話題可能會有點心酸。

original: Stop apologizing for everything.
string: 別再一直道歉了。

original: Have you thought about getting cured of vampirism?
string: 妳有想過把吸血鬼病治好嗎？

original: I'm not talking about this with you any more.
string: 我不想再跟你討論這個話題了。

original: You brought that up before... I think I was a little short with you.
string: 你之前有提過......我當時態度可能不太好。

original: No... why?
string: 沒有......怎麼了？

original: Never mind.
string: 算了。

original: I'm sure.
string: 我確定。

original: That makes sense.
string: 很合理。

original: Figured.
string: 我就知道。

original: You're all talk.
string: 你只會說大話。

original: Don't say I didn't warn you.
string: 別說我沒警告你。

original: All right, then. Hold still.
string: 好吧。別動。

original: I don't think that's something you want. You're a little... I just don't think you're the type.
string: 我不認為那是你要的。你有點......我不認為你合適。

original: Are you sure that's something you want? This isn't like picking out a new outfit. You'll be a creature of the night, like me.
string: 你確定那是你要的嗎？這不像挑選新衣服。你會成為夜晚的動物，跟我一樣。

original: I want you to turn me into a vampire.
string: 我想要妳把我變成吸血鬼。

original: Have you ever seen anything like this?
string: 妳以前有看過這種景象嗎？

original: It's not like anything else in Skyrim, I can tell you that much. From now or... before.
string: 這不像是天際省境內的任何事物。不論是現在的或是......以前的。

original: There's probably groves like this all over Tamriel. Most people just don't even know what to look for.
string: 或許整個泰姆瑞爾大陸都有類似的林地。但大多數的人只是沒去注意。

original: And I thought the Soul Cairn was creepy.
string: 這比靈魂石塚還要恐怖。

original: I wonder how long they've been like this.
string: 不曉得他們在裡頭多久了。

original: These Falmer are... they're frozen in the ice.
string: 這些伐莫族......被冰凍在冰塊裡。

original: Wait, is he talking about me?
string: 等等，他是在說我嗎？

original: "The Winking Skeever." Charming name.
string: 「眨眼惡鼠」。真有趣的名字。

original: What can I do to help?
string: 有什麼可以效勞的？

original: You're going to go kill a Dawnguard spy.
string: 你需要殺死一個暮光守衛間諜。

original: But don't draw attention. Some kills are for fun, some for profit. And others are for sending messages. This one is a message.
string: 但是別引起注意。有時殺人是為了樂趣，有時是為了酬勞。別的時候則是為了傳遞訊息。這次是要傳遞訊息。

original: With any luck he'll bleed to death before anyone notices. A cold corpse will say what we want better than a warm one.
string: 運氣好的話，他會在被人發現之前血流過多而死。一具冰冷的屍體比起一具溫暖的更能表達我們的需求。

original: I've learned the whereabouts of a troublesome Dawnguard member. You will track him down and dispose of him.
string: 我知道某個惹人厭的暮光守衛會在哪裡出沒。你去找到他，然後把他料理掉。

original: But please, do be discreet. Our aim isn't to stir the nest, just to skin a rat, reminding them that they are the prey.
string: 但是請你暗中進行。我們的目的不是戳破蜂窩，只要把老鼠的皮剝了，讓他們知道自己是獵物就行了。

original: I've killed the Dawnguard masquerading as a <Alias=Target>.
string: 我殺了假扮成<Alias=Target>的暮光守衛。

original: Apparently you had blood in your ears when I said not to draw attention to yourself. If I wanted a messy kill I would have said so.
string: 你的耳朵是被血凝固了嗎？我不是叫你別引起注意嗎？如果我要你隨便殺掉他的話，我會跟你說。

original: But a kill is a kill, and it'll send a message to the Dawnguard, if not exactly the one we wanted.
string: 但是殺了就殺了。這樣還是會傳達訊息給那些暮光守衛，儘管不完全是我要的。

original: While that's one less trouble maker to keep an eye on, you could have been more discreet in your approach to the problem.
string: 儘管你替我們拔掉了這根眼中釘，你辦事的手法太過於粗糙了。

original: I had thought better of you.
string: 你真的令我失望。

original: Well done. Nothing like a good kill to get the blood pumping, is there?
string: 做得好。殺人過後那種熱血沸騰的感覺很舒服吧？

original: Excellent. I knew I could count on you. That's one less trouble maker to keep an eye on.
string: 非常好，我就知道我能依賴你。這樣就少一個麻煩了。

original: Here's where I fell. Feels like ages ago.
string: 我就是在這裡掉落的。感覺像是幾百年前的事了。

original: Watch your step.
string: 小心腳步。

original: Not bad. Not bad at all.
string: 不賴。很不賴。

original: Look, there's a chest in there. Door's sealed tight, though...
string: 你看。裡面有個寶箱。但是門被鎖死了......

original: Falmer up ahead.
string: 前方有伐莫族。

original: Watch yourself. Since the quake, this place has been pretty unstable.
string: 你要小心。自從發生地震後，這個地方變得很不穩定。

original: Hey! Grab my journal. If you survive, you're going to need it.
string: 喂！把我的日誌拿去！你要是能夠存活，會對你有幫助的。

original: All right. Good luck.
string: 好的。祝你好運。

original: It's your funeral.
string: 那就去送死吧。

original: Get out of my way.
string: 別擋我的路。

original: Careful now... this area's not stable.
string: 小心了，這區很不穩。

original: Watch yourself.
string: 注意了。

original: That was close...
See that thing?
string: 看到那了沒？

original: I spent my life tracking down that legend... until my damn apprentice stole everything from me, and published it all under his own name.
string: 我畢生都在追尋這個傳說......但是我那該死的學徒把全部都偷走了，然後以自己的名字公諸於世。

original: And now... now I can't rest. Not until I have proof. Something to show the world what I discovered, what I did. That my life... mattered.
string: 現在......現在我無法安息。我必須找到證據來證明我的發現、證明我的成就。證明我的人生......是有意義的。

original: It's a long story.
string: 說來話長。

original: How did you end up here?
string: 你為什麼會在這裡？

original: All right. Lead on, then.
string: 好，帶路吧。

original: Sure, I'd like the help.
string: 當然，我很樂意幫妳。

original: Watch out!
string: 小心！

original: You ever heard of Aetherium? A rare mineral used by the dwarves.
string: 你有聽過神光水晶嗎？那是矮人用的稀有礦石。

original: Supposedly, they had to build a special forge, the Aetherium Forge, to even work with it.
string: 據說他們建造了一個特別的熔爐，叫做神光水晶熔爐，專門用來處理這種礦石。

original: The items it made were so powerful they went to war over it, and the Forge was lost. Or so the story goes.
string: 製造出來的物品非常強大，大到開啟戰端。而熔爐也消失了，至少人們是那樣說的。

original: Why did you come here?
string: 你為什麼會來到這裡？

original: You know what this is? It's a lock. A 'Tonal Lock'. Simple, and very, very deadly.
string: 你知道這是什麼嗎？這叫「調諧鎖」。很簡約，但是非常、非常致命。

original: Really? Well, now, that make things easier...
string: 真的嗎？看來這可以簡化一些事情......

original: (Sigh)...
Bother someone else.
string: 去煩別人去。

original: Life here is better than you could find anywhere in Skyrim.
string: 這裡的生活比起天際省的其他地方要愜意許多。

original: Remember your place, and you'll be taken care of.
string: 記得你的身份，就不會被虧待。

original: I hope you find Lord Harkon's court to your liking.
string: 希望你會喜歡赫岡的宮廷。

original: Here we are, in view of seeing the prophecy fulfilled. These are truly great times.
string: 我們即將見證預言的實現。這真是偉大的日子。

original: You realize that doesn't impress anyone here.
string: 這裡不會有人對此感到驚訝。

original: Don't get in my way, and I won't tear your arms off. Simple, isn't it?
string: 別妨礙我，要不然我就把你的手臂扯下來。夠明白吧？

original: You can't trust a word that comes out of Vingalmo's mouth. Remember that.
string: 你不能相信文嘉莫說的任何一句話。記得這點。

original: We need strength, power. Not magic. Elves don't seem to understand that.
string: 我們只需要力量，不要魔法。這些精靈似乎都無法理解。

original: So you found the Moth Priest. Let's see you find the rest of the Elder Scrolls all on your own.
string: 看來你找到了先祖蛾祭司。接下來看你是否能獨自找到其他的上古卷軸。

original: You've gone from a between-meal snack to the darling of the court. Impressive.
string: 你從飯前點心變成宮廷的寵兒。真是令人敬佩。

original: I don't converse with my meals.
string: 我不跟食物交談。

original: None can deny your power now.
string: 沒人可以忽視你的力量。

original: I wish Orthjolf and Vingalmo would just get it over with and kill each other. I'm tired of listening to them.
string: 我真希望歐茲約夫跟文嘉莫可以直接做個了斷，互相了結對方。我已經聽到煩了。

original: Why worry about who has the bigger chair at the table when there's more than enough to go around?
string: 何必在乎誰是老大呢？他強由他強，懂嗎？

original: Parading around in that form won't do you any good here.
string: 你用這個型態在這裡逛大街對你沒好處。

original: Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.
string: 立刻拜見赫岡大人。

original: I am above the petty squabbles here. I have lived for far too long to be bothered with them.
string: 他們爭的那些雞毛蒜皮小事我已經看透了。我活得夠久，不會再讓他們干擾我。

original: You realize it's not really necessary to take on that form here.
string: 你其實不需要用這個型態在這裡出現。

original: I am at your service, as always.
string: 一如既往，為您服務。

original: I saw more than enough political maneuvering in my time in House Dres. I was tired of it then, and I'm tired of it now.
string: 我在德瑞斯氏族的那段時間已經看了夠多的政治操作。我當時就感到不耐煩了。現在也一樣不耐煩。

original: I have never understood the Nord fascination with weapons. Magic is so much more versatile, don't you think?
string: 我一直都搞不懂諾德人對於兵器的熱誠。魔法不是好用多了嗎？

original: Yes, yes. Aren't you lovely looking like that. Do you mind?
string: 是的，是的。你這樣看起來真是太可愛了。你介意嗎？

original: You disrespect our Lord by speaking to me instead of him.
string: 你跟我說話是在侮辱我們的領主。

original: No one will soon forget that you were the one to defeat Harkon.
string: 你擊敗赫岡這件事不容忽視。

original: If you need anything, say the word. I can still forge a decent blade.
string: 你需要什麼就說吧。鑄造一把利刃還難不倒我。

original: Never made it far in the Companions, but now... I'd like to see any of them try and call me "whelp" again.
string: 我在戰友團的時候一直得不到尊重......現在看他們誰還敢叫我「犬兒」。

original: It's difficult to have a conversation with you like that. Would you mind changing back?
string: 你這樣子我很難跟你溝通。你變回來好嗎？

original: Don't speak to me, meat.
string: 別跟我說話，食物。

original: You're welcome here, as long as you don't overfeed on the thralls.
string: 我們歡迎你，但是別把奴僕吃光了。

original: I try and meet the needs of everyone here. No reason for any of us to go hungry.
string: 我試著滿足這裡每個人的需求。大家肚子都不用挨餓。

original: Mind yourself in that form. Don't go damaging my thralls.
string: 你在這個型態時小心點。別傷害我的奴僕。

original: No, no. You must speak with Lord Harkon, not me!
string: 不、不。你必須跟赫岡大人說話，不是跟我。

original: I hope you find life in the castle to be to your liking.
string: 希望你還習慣城堡裡的生活。

original: Feran is so good to me, allowing me to be his assistant.
string: 費蘭對我不錯，讓我當他的助理。

original: It is good to have powerful allies, is it not?
string: 有強大的同盟感覺不錯吧？

original: I hope you're not trying to lord your abilities over me.
string: 你不會讓自己的能力超過我吧？

original: Look at you, wandering around causing trouble. Precious.
string: 你看看你。到處亂跑惹麻煩。太可愛了。

original: Life here has many advantages, don't you agree?
string: 這裡的生活充滿冒險刺激，你同意嗎？

original: Politics bore me terribly, but they're a fact of life here.
string: 政治太無趣了，但是在這裡的日子沒有政治不行。

original: Living here, I have access to magic I couldn't possibly imagine before.
string: 在這裡接觸到的魔法是我之前完全想像不到的。

original: I find it tiring to converse with someone in that form. Too much effort.
string: 跟這個型態的人交談太累了。太大費周章。

original: My Lady.
string: 我的女士。

original: Do you need something?
string: 需要什麼嗎？

original: Lord Harkon will finally have his wish... to see the prophecy fulfilled. Then we will all benefit.
string: 赫岡大人終於可以滿足他的心願......看到預言被實現。接著我們大家也都能從中得利。

original: Can we really trust the words of this Moth Priest? What if he's just lying to save his worthless skin?
string: 我們真的能夠相信先祖蛾祭司說的話嗎？也許他在撒謊只為了保住自己一條狗命。

original: All this talk of Elder Scrolls and Auriel's Bow... Lord Harkon's ambition truly is great.
string: 三句不離上古卷軸還有奧麗瑞的弓......赫岡大人真是野心勃勃。

original: I'm sure Lord Harkon is grateful you've returned his daughter.
string: 你把赫岡大人的女兒帶回來他一定很感激你。

original: Seems you're the court favorite. At least, for the moment.
string: 看來你是宮廷的寵兒。至少，目前還是。

original: Mind yourself.
string: 小心點啊。

original: Well met, brother.
string: 幸會，兄弟。

original: If there's any way I can be of service, please let me know.
string: 如果有任何地方需要小的的服務，請務必通知小的。

original: Lord Harkon has searched for his daughter for so long. He must be very grateful.
string: 赫岡大人已經花了很長一段時間在找他的女兒。他想必會非常感激。

original: Once saw Harkon rip a man in half. He's powerful like you wouldn't believe.
string: 我曾目睹赫岡把一個人撕成兩半。他的力量大到你無法想像。

original: Let someone else rule. I just want to kill and feed.
string: 讓別人去當王。我只想要殺人飲血。

original: It is an honor to serve Harkon, is it not?
string: 效忠赫岡是一種榮耀，不覺得嗎？

original: You would dare address me?
string: 你居然敢直呼我的名號？

original: Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.
string: 立刻去拜見赫岡大人。

original: I leave politics to others. I serve the lord of the castle.
string: 政治交給別人處理就好。我只服侍城堡的主人。

original: I have everything I need right here.
string: 我要的都有了。

original: Find your own thrall. This one's mine.
string: 去找別的奴僕。這隻是我的。

original: Leave me in peace.
string: 別打擾我。

original: I'm a loyal servant of the lord of the castle, nothing more.
string: 我只是城堡主人忠誠的僕人，僅此而已。

original: Sit down and enjoy yourself.
string: 坐下來，別客氣。

original: The feast never ends here in Castle Volkihar.
string: 弗基哈爾城堡的宴席永不落幕。

original: There's plenty for all.
string: 大家都有得吃。

original: First Serana, now you find a Moth Priest. I'm sure Lord Harkon is very pleased with you... for now.
string: 先是找到瑟拉娜，現在又讓你找到先祖蛾祭司。我相信赫岡大人對你很滿意......目前來說。

original: My Lord.
string: 我的主人......

original: Well met, sister.
string: 幸會，姐妹。

original: Hello there.
string: 你好啊。

original: Very good. I'll just... I'll be going now.
string: 非常好。我就......我這就告退。

original: In the unlikely event that I ever require you for some reason, I shall find you. Until then I see no reason for us to be speaking.
string: 未來要是有需要，雖然我認為那情形不會發生，我會找到你的。在那天到來之前我看不出任何我們需要交談的必要。

original: No, I just... I thought perhaps...
string: 不，我只是......我想說也許......

original: I don't recall addressing you, worm.
string: 我不記得我有跟你說話，蟲子。

original: Vingalmo, is there... can I do anything for you?
string: 文嘉莫，有任何......地方我可以為你效勞嗎？

original: Yes, Feran. Of course. I'll see to it.
string: 是的，費蘭。當然。交給我處理。

original: I don't want to hear about it. I want what I asked for.
string: 我不想聽這些。我要我的東西。

original: Ah, yes. That. There were... well, complications.
string: 啊，對。那個......出現了一些......嗯，麻煩。

original: Ronthil, where is the last batch of alchemy ingredients I asked you for?
string: 隆席爾，我跟你要的最後一批鍊金材料在哪裡？

original: Yes, of course.
string: 是，當然。

original: No, I don't need anything right now. Please stop asking.
string: 不，我現在什麼都不需要。請別再問了。

original: Can I assist you? You know I live to serve.
string: 我可以服務你嗎？我是為了服侍而生的。

original: What?
string: 什麼？

original: Do you... do you need anything, Feran?
string: 你有......你有需要什麼嗎？費蘭。

original: Wonderful. Carry on, then.
string: 太美好了。繼續吧。

original: No, sire. I have not.
string: 不，閣下。我沒忘。

original: And you haven't forgotten what you need to do, have you?
string: 而你，你沒有忘了你該做的事吧？

original: I am well, sire.
string: 閣下，我很好。

original: My dear Salonia, how are you?
string: 我親愛的莎蘿妮雅，妳好嗎？

original: Oh, I see. I just assumed he'd sent for both of us. How awkward for you.
string: 喔，我了解了。我誤以為他是召見我們兩人。真是尷尬啊。

original: What? What meeting? I wasn't informed of any such thing!
string: 什麼？什麼會議？沒人通知我有這回事！

original: Surprised you weren't at the last meeting with our Lord, Vingalmo. Too busy plotting to overthrow him to show up?
string: 我很驚訝你居然沒有參與上次主人召開的會議，文嘉莫。你忙著推翻他，忙到沒時間出席了嗎？

original: And you'd do well to be more careful of whom you engage in witty banter.
string: 你跟人耍嘴皮子之前最好注意一下你的對象是誰。

original: You'd do well to watch that tongue, elf.
string: 你最好管好你的嘴巴，精靈。

original: I didn't even think you knew what a book was, my brutish friend.
string: 我沒想到你居然知道什麼是書本，我野蠻的朋友。

original: Orthjolf, I'm surprised!
string: 歐茲約夫，真令我驚訝！

original: Well, well. Where've you been, Vingalmo? Nose stuck in a book all day?
string: 嗯，嗯。你上哪去啦，文嘉莫？一整天都把頭埋在書本裡嗎？

original: Arkay says it's good that we're here, but I don't know... Something about this place doesn't feel right.
string: 阿爾凱對於我們的到來感到高興，但是我不知道......這地方感覺不太對勁。

original: What? No, no. Yes, I see. All right.
string: 什麼？不，不。是，我懂了。好的。

original: Right. I'll settle in and then Arkay and I will start to put things right. Don't you worry.
string: 好。我先安頓下來，然後阿爾凱跟我會設法把事情搞定。你就別擔心了。

original: Here we are.
string: 我們到啦。

original: It begins again.
string: 又開始了。

original: I fear for what is to come.
string: 我擔心接下來的事。

original: Well, this isn't exactly a palace, is it? Still, it's sturdy, secure, and seems defensible.
string: 嗯，我知道這不是金碧輝煌的皇宮。但是看起來很堅固，安全，也好防禦。

original: I suppose I'd rather be here than most other places in Skyrim. If Isran needs me, it must be pretty bad.
string: 我想我寧可待在這裡，也不想待在天際省的任何其他地方。如果伊士冉需要我的幫忙，情況大概真的很危急。

original: I wonder what we're up against here.
string: 我們要面對的敵人不曉得有多強大。

original: Any advice for a new vampire hunter?
string: 有什麼建議要給一個新手吸血鬼獵人嗎？

original: There's only one thing worth remembering.
string: 記得一件事就夠了。

original: When it comes to vampires, if you're sloppy or careless, you're dead. And good people will die because of you.
string: 面對吸血鬼的時候，假如你太慢、不夠小心，你就會死。然後有其他的好人會因你而死。

original: I've lasted this long because I don't take chances, I cover my tracks, and I keep my eyes open. If you're smart, you'll do the same.
string: 我可以活到現在是因為我不冒險。我不留下痕跡，眼睛也總是放亮。你聰明的話就照著辦。

original: I knew it would come to this one day. I knew, and no one believed.
string: 我知道這一天會到來。我早知道了，但沒人相信我。

original: Be on your guard at all times. Avoid sleep if you can... Sleep is for the weak.
string: 隨時保持警戒。可以的話就別睡覺了......只有弱者才需要睡眠。

original: Even with all my preparations, we can't be too careful. The monsters could strike at us at any moment.
string: 儘管我做了那麼多的準備，我們還是不能絲毫大意。那些怪物隨時會對我們展開攻擊。

original: The vampires will show us no mercy. They've proven that.
string: 那些吸血鬼不會對我們手下留情。這毫無疑問。

original: If we're going to survive this, we're going to have to be as ruthless as our enemies.
string: 如果我們想要存活，就必須跟我們的敵人一樣無情。

original: Hope you're getting along with Isran. He takes some getting used to.
string: 希望你跟伊士冉還相處得來。需要花點時間才能習慣和他相處。

original: I like what Isran has done with the place. It's good to see someone else who's really prepared.
string: 我喜歡伊士冉在這裡做的這些事。很高興看到有人做好準備。

original: Very few people appreciate all the horrible things that can happen to you if you're not being cautious.
string: 很少人能夠理解，在不夠小心的情況下可能發生哪些糟糕的事情。

original: There are at least thirty different ways of being attacked and killed in your own home at any given moment.
string: 任何時候，都至少有三十種不同的方法可以讓你在家裡被攻擊或被殺。

original: I think we have a better chance of surviving here, don't you?
string: 我覺得我們在這裡的存活機率要高一些，不覺得嗎？

original: Cozy little place, isn't this?
string: 很舒適的小窩，對吧？

original: This is fine for now, but we can't stay holed up here forever.
string: 這裡短時間來說還可以，但我們不能永遠躲在這裡。

original: Our sense of what's right is what separates us from the vampires. Don't forget that.
string: 我們跟吸血鬼的相異之處在於我們知道什麼是對的。別忘了這點。

original: We can't give up. There's no one else to stand against these monsters.
string: 我們不能放棄。沒有其他人可以對抗那些怪物。

original: We'll stop these monsters. We have to; we're the only ones who can.
string: 我們會阻止那些怪物。我們一定要成功，因為沒有其他人了。

original: Arkay's been watching over me for years now. He says he's not too sure about you yet, though.
string: 阿爾凱已經觀察我幾年了。但他說他對你還不夠了解。

original: I once killed thirty vampires with my bare hands, you know. Ask Arkay, he'll tell you.
string: 你知道嗎？我曾經徒手殺死三十多隻吸血鬼。不信去問阿爾凱，他會告訴你。

original: Don't you worry about me. I've been through worse. I'll come out of this just fine.
string: 別擔心我。我經歷過更糟的事。這次我也會安然度過的。

original: It is my sworn duty to see Arkay's wrath delivered to all the undead. It's usually a good bit of fun, too.
string: 我發誓過要將阿爾凱的憤怒帶給所有的不死生物。通常也滿好玩的。

original: How can I help?
string: 我可以幫上忙嗎？

original: Well met, friend.
string: 幸會，朋友。

original: Arkay be with you, my friend.
string: 願阿爾凱與你同在，我的朋友。

original: What can I do for you?
string: 我可以為你做什麼事嗎？

original: Need something?
string: 需要什麼嗎？

original: What is it?
string: 怎麼了？

original: Is something wrong?
string: 怎麼了嗎？

original: Got to keep alert. We don't want to get caught napping like the Vigilants did.
string: 要保持警覺。我們不能像那些警戒者一樣在睡夢中被帶走。

original: I don't think the vampires would be stupid enough to attack us here, but you never know.
string: 我不認為那些吸血鬼會笨到來這裡攻擊我們。但是話不能說太滿。

original: I'm glad we're finally taking the fight to those monsters.
string: 我很高興我們終於能夠主動出擊。

original: I hope the vampires try to attack us here. A lot easier than hunting them down in their holes.
string: 我希望吸血鬼可以來這裡攻擊我們。這比起爬進洞裡獵殺牠們要來得簡單許多。

original: Isran knows how to fight those monsters. He's been preparing for this day for a long time.
string: 伊士冉知道怎麼打擊那些怪物。他為了今天的到來已經準備很久了。

original: Now that the Dawnguard are back, the vampires' reign of terror is about to end.
string: 既然暮光守衛回來了，代表吸血鬼的統治要結束了。

original: I was wondering when I'd see you again.
string: 我還在想什麼時候能再見到妳。

original: Here I am. Human as ever.
string: 我回來啦。變回人類了。

original: It's like the world is alive again. Just like me.
string: 世界好像重生了。就跟我一樣。

original: You're not a vampire anymore?
string: 妳不是吸血鬼了？

original: All clean. I feel like I can breathe again for the first time since I was turned.
string: 被治療啦。自從我被轉變以來，這是我第一次可以好好呼吸。

original: The world is alive, and so am I, for once.
string: 世界整個活起來了，跟我一樣。

original: There you are. I'm... I'm back.
string: 你在這裡啊？我......我回來了。

original: I'll see you when I'm done. For now, I need to just do this.
string: 我處理完後會再找你。現在我必須做這件事。

original: Good luck.
string: 祝妳好運。

original: I'll see you soon.
string: 到時候見。

original: I want to come with you.
string: 我想跟妳一起走。

original: I know you do, but this is something I need to do alone.
string: 我知道你想，但是這件事我得一個人面對。

original: I'll see you again. Soon.
string: 我們會再相遇的。不要急。

original: What can I do to help?
string: 我該怎麼幫你？

original: Sorine needs help with her project to improve our crossbows. And if that doesn't interest you...
string: 索琳需要你協助她來改良我們的石弩。如果你對這沒興趣的話......

original: Speak with Isran. He has something for you.
string: 去找伊士冉。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Gunmar. He has something for you.
string: 去找岡馬。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Florentius. He has something for you.
string: 去找佛羅倫提。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Isran. He has something for you.
string: 去找伊士冉。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Gunmar. He has something for you.
string: 去找岡馬。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Florentius. He has something for you.
string: 去找佛羅倫提。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Sorine. She has something for you.
string: 去找索琳。她有事找你。

original: Speak with Orthjolf. He has something for you.
string: 去找歐茲約夫。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Vingalmo. He has something for you.
string: 去找文嘉莫。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Feran Sadri. He has something for you.
string: 去找費蘭．莎迪。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Garan Marethi. He has something for you.
string: 去找加蘭．瑪瑞提。他有事找你。

original: Speak with Fura Bloodmouth. She has something for you.
string: 去找芙拉．血嘴。她有事找你。

original: And you carried out my instructions to kill the victim in view of others and while wearing the Dawnguard uniform. Very good.
string: 而且你也遵循我的指示穿著暮光守衛的制服在眾人面前殺了人。非常好。

original: But you did not follow instructions to kill the victim in view of others while wearing the Dawnguard uniform.
string: 可是你沒有遵循指示穿著暮光守衛的制服在其他人面前把人殺了。

original: The letter left on the corpse shall have to suffice. It will no doubt be found.
string: 放在屍體上的紙條應該足夠了。它無疑會被人發現。

original: I see you chose a suitably high profile target. Well done.
string: 看來你找了一個非常知名的目標。很好。

original: I had hoped you would have chosen a higher profile target. But the deed is done, and it's effect secured.
string: 我本來期望你會挑選一個名人當作目標。但是任務完成了，效果也達到了。

original: It is done. I've slain someone on the streets of <Alias=City>.
string: 完成了。我在<Alias=City>的街道上殺了人。

original: Very good. That should, for a time, direct the people's anger towards the Dawnguard and away from us.
string: 非常好。這樣人們的憤怒暫時會轉移到暮光守衛上，而非針對我們。

original: I heard you might need help.
string: 我聽說你需要協助。

original: The Dawnguard have increased their operations and have been aggressively recruiting.
string: 暮光守衛的動作越來越頻繁。而且也在積極招募人馬。

original: We need to put a damper on their efforts and give those trouble makers something to worry about other than harassing our interests.
string: 我們需要澆熄他們的努力，替那些煩人的傢伙挖幾個洞，這樣他們才不會一直干涉我們的好事。

original: You are to make a public show of murdering someone. Do it in the streets for all to see. The higher the profile the better.
string: 我要你在公開場合殺人。就在大街上執行吧，讓所有人看到。目標越有名氣越好。

original: Make it seem you are a member of the Dawnguard, thus sowing confusion among the herd. Wear this armor and plant this note on the victim.
string: 假裝成暮光守衛的一員，給人群製造疑惑。穿上這身護甲然後把這張紙條放在死者身上。

original: The <Alias=Boss> at <Alias=Dungeon> has been dealt with.
string: 在<Alias=Dungeon>的<Alias=Boss>已經被解決了。

original: Good job.
string: 非常好。

original: At first you may pity the thin-bloods. But after disposing of a few, you realize they aren't worth the worry.
string: 你最初可能會同情那些混血。但是殺了幾隻之後你就會理解自己先前的感受完全是多餘的。

original: You have done well.
string: 你做得很好。

original: It may seem cruel that we hold our thin-blooded kin in low esteem. But our needs must come before theirs.
string: 我們瞧不起那些混血看似殘酷。但是我們的需求一定要被優先滿足。

original: What can I do to help?
string: 我可以幫上什麼忙嗎？

original: A bunch of feral vampires are running wild, upsetting the mortals.
string: 一群野性吸血鬼四處作亂，惹怒了凡人。

original: When the prey is riled, it makes things difficult for us.
string: 當獵物被激起鬥性，我們也會有麻煩。

original: Go cull the brutish beasts before the problem gets out of hand.
string: 在事情變得難以收拾之前去把那些野蠻的畜生殺了。

original: A cadre of lesser beasts has become a nuisance, taking too bold an approach to their feeding.
string: 一群次等的畜牲到處惹麻煩，獵食的方式太過囂張。

original: The herd is becoming distressed, which makes it more difficult for us to slip in and out undetected.
string: 人群的警覺性提高了，增添我們暗中出入的麻煩。

original: It is time to cull the weak.
string: 該把弱者除掉了。

original: I have returned from <Alias=Dungeon> with the <Alias=Remains>.
string: 我從<Alias=Dungeon>將<Alias=Remains>帶回來了。

original: Wonderful. I'll make the necessary preparations for infusion into the Chalice presently.
string: 太好了。我會做好必要的準備，把它注入聖杯之中。

original: What can I do to help?
string: 我可以幫上什麼忙嗎？

original: I've been performing a little research on the Blood Chalice.
string: 我稍微研究了一下鮮血聖杯。

original: I believe we can prolong its salutary effects if we infuse it with potent vampiric blood.
string: 要是我們在裡面加入強大吸血鬼的血液應該可以延長它的效果。

original: The potency of the Blood Chalice is beginning to wane. We must infuse it with more power if we are to keep it's fullest effects.
string: 鮮血聖杯的效果開始變弱了。我們需要注入更多的能量如果我們想要讓它維持最強效果。

original: I've located the petrified remains of an elder vampire. Bring them to me, and I should be able to extend the effects granted by the Blood Chalice.
string: 我知道一個地方留存著一具硬化的吸血鬼長老殘骸。把它帶來給我，我就能延長鮮血聖杯的效果。

original: I've located additional petrified remains of an elder vampire. Bring them to me, and I'll extend the effects granted by the Blood Chalice.
string: 我知道另一個地方存留著硬化的吸血鬼長老殘骸。把它帶來給我，我就能延長鮮血聖杯的效果。

original: I have killed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: 我在<Alias=Dungeon>殺死了<Alias=Vampire>。

original: Good work. It's always best to deal with a problem by ripping it out at the root.
string: 非常好。把麻煩連根拔起是最好的解決方式。

original: Good. I prefer to nip budding problems before they reach full bloom. I trust it wasn't too much of an effort on your part.
string: 很好。我寧可在麻煩擴大之前就解決掉。我相信那對你來說不算是問題。

original: What can I do to help?
string: 我可以幫上什麼忙嗎？

original: A feral-blooded has holed up with a group of bandits. Likely wants to create a nest of broodlings.
string: 一隻野鬼跟一群強盜躲在一起。看來牠想要培養一窩的野種。

original: One of the feral brood has joined a group of bandits, presumably with aims to grant the gift to the entire lot of them.
string: 一隻野鬼加入了一群強盜。看來牠想要把牠的力量分享給其他人。

original: A feral-blooded has holed up with a group of necromancers. Likely wants to create a nest of broodlings.
string: 一隻野鬼跟一群死靈術士躲起來了。看來牠想要培養一窩的野種。

original: One of the feral brood has joined a group of nercromancers, presumably with aims to grant the gift to the entire lot of them.
string: 一隻野鬼加入了一群死靈術士。看來牠想要把牠的力量分享給其他人。

original: Have to say, I'm pretty impressed.
string: 我必須說我感到很佩服。

original: See the Resonators up there? Strike them in the right order, and the doors should open.
string: 你看到上面的調諧器了嗎？按照正確順序打下去應該就可以把門打開。

original: Get it wrong, and... well. You've seen what happened when I tried it.
string: 如果順序錯的話......嗯。你看我就知道結果會是如何。

original: See those things in the alcoves up there? 'Kinetic Resonators', the dwarves called them. Strike them in the right order, and the doors should open.
string: 你看到上面壁凹裡面那些東西了嗎？矮人稱那為「動能調諧器」。按照正確順序打下去門應該就會開了。

original: Get it wrong, and... well. You've seen what happened when I tried it.
string: 如果順序錯的話......嗯，看我就知道下場會是如何。

original: I mentioned that there was one more danger. Here it is.
string: 我之前有提到真正危險的部分。就是這裡了。

original: Hold up. We... need to talk.
string: 等等。我們......得要談一下。

original: None of the others ever made it this far.
string: 沒有任何人成功到達這裡。

original: Quite a place, huh? Was even more impressive before it all fell to pieces.
string: 這地方很了不起吧？它崩塌之前還更壯觀呢。

original: Damn things are like flies. No matter how many you kill...
string: 這些該死的東西就跟蒼蠅一樣。不管殺幾隻都沒用......

original: Take good care of it for me.
string: 替我好好照顧它。

original: Hey, there's my bow! There, out on the log. Wondered what happened to it.
string: 喂，我的弓在那裡！就在那棵樹上。之前都找不到說。

original: Go on.
string: 請繼續說。

original: The soul of a dragon is as resilient as its owner's scaly hide.
string: 龍的魂就如同牠的皮一樣充滿韌性。

original: It's possible that your killing blow has merely displaced Durnehviir's physical form while he reconstitutes himself.
string: 你的致命一擊也許只是暫時轉移度尼維爾的肉體型態。牠現在可能正在重新自我復原。

original: What makes you say that?
string: 妳為何這麼說？

original: Volumes written on Durnehviir allege that he can't be slain by normal means. It appears they were mistaken.
string: 所有關於度尼維爾的記述都說只靠一般手法，是不可能殺死牠的。看來前人都錯了。

original: Unless...
What happened to the dragon?
string: 那隻龍怎麼了？

original: Forgive my astonishment, but I never thought I'd witness the death of that dragon.
string: 原諒我如此驚訝，但是我從未預料到自己會見證這隻龍的死。

original: I'll kill Harkon.
string: 我會殺死赫岡。

original: If you believe that, then you're a bigger fool than I originally suspected. Don't you think I weighed that option before I enacted my plans?
string: 你如果當真這麼想，那你比我原本預估的還要笨。你以為我在執行計劃之前沒有考量到這點嗎？

original: I would never allow that to happen.
string: 我永遠不會讓此事發生。

original: And how exactly do you plan on stopping him?
string: 那你打算怎麼阻止他？

original: And how exactly do you plan on completing the prophecy without the death of my daughter?
string: 那你打算如何完成預言，同時又不讓我的女兒犧牲？

original: I would never allow that to happen.
string: 我永遠不會讓此事發生。

original: I've been keeping her safe.
string: 我一直在保護著她。

original: Safe? You call bringing her here safe? Has she explained nothing to you?
string: 保護她？你把她帶來這裡叫做保護她？她難道沒有跟你解釋過嗎？

original: Coming from one who murders vampires as a trade, I find it hard to believe your intentions are noble.
string: 你的職業是獵殺吸血鬼，我很難相信你的意圖是高貴的。

original: This is no ruse. I want to keep her safe.
string: 這不是騙局。我想要保護她。

original: Mother!
string: 媽媽！

original: You. Come forward. I would speak with you.
string: 你。過來。我有話要跟你說。

original: No, you don't...
Wait a moment... you've brought a stranger here? Have you lost your mind?
string: 等等......妳居然帶一個陌生人來？妳瘋了嗎？

original: No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to stop him... to make everything right.
string: 不，妳完全搞錯了。我們是來阻止他的......我們要讓一切恢復正常。

original: No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to complete the prophecy our way, not his.
string: 不，妳完全搞錯了。我們要用我們的方式完成預言，而不是按照他的方法。

original: I must have failed. Harkon's found a way to decipher the prophecy, hasn't he.
string: 看來我失敗了。赫岡找到了方法解讀預言對吧？

original: He doesn't know we're here. I don't have time to explain.
string: 他不知道我們在這裡。我沒時間解釋這一切。

original: Serana? What are you doing here? Where's your father?
string: 瑟拉娜？妳在這裡做什麼？妳爸爸在哪？

original: Is it really you? I can't believe it!
string: 真的是妳嗎？我不敢相信！

original: How do we get inside? We have to talk.
string: 我們要怎樣進去？我們得談一下。

original: Is it really you? I can't believe it!
string: 真的是妳嗎？我不敢相信！

original: You wanted to speak with me?
string: 你想來跟我談？

original: So how has it come to pass that a vampire of mixed blood is in the company of my daughter?
string: 所以，我的女兒為什麼會跟一個混血的吸血鬼在一起呢？

original: So how has it come to pass that a vampire hunter is in the company of my daughter?
string: 所以，我的女兒為什麼會跟一個吸血鬼獵人在一起呢？

original: It pains me to think you'd travel with Serana under the guise of her protector in an effort to hunt me down.
string: 你為了獵殺我，居然假意保護我女兒，跟她一起四處遊走。這真是讓我心痛。

original: Did you have anything to ask before you depart?
string: 你離開之前有什麼問題要問的嗎？

original: What did you want?
string: 你想要什麼？

original: Idiot! I can't get to the scroll with Durnehviir attacking us!
string: 白癡！杜尼維爾攻擊我們，我怎麼有辦法拿到卷軸？

original: Focus on the dragon!
string: 注意那隻龍！

original: The Elder Scroll is just a bit further.
string: 上古卷軸就在附近了。

original: Only a single spire remains. Be careful, I'm almost certain the final Keeper will be prepared for your assault.
string: 只剩下一座尖塔了。但要小心，我很確定最後的守護者已經在等著你們。

original: You're doing well, but two of the spires remain intact.
string: 你做得很好，但是還有兩座尖塔必須被摧毀。

original: If you want that scroll, the barrier needs to come down.
string: 如果你想要卷軸，就得把防護罩降下來。

original: The sooner we get the scroll home, the sooner we deal with my father.
string: 我們越早把卷軸帶回去，就能越早面對我爸爸。

original: I'm glad we found the scroll, but I... I wish she could come with us.
string: 我很高興我們能找到卷軸，但是我......我真希望她能跟我們一起走。

original: Come on, let's go home.
string: 快吧，回家去。

original: Kill that beast!
string: 殺死那隻怪獸！

original: We have to keep my mother alive!
string: 我們不能讓我媽媽死去！

original: Come on, she's leading us to the scroll.
string: 來吧，她要帶我們去拿卷軸。

original: The barrier should be gone now. Let's head back.
string: 防護罩應該降下去了，我們往回走吧。

original: Let's kill those... Keeper things and get back to the prison.
string: 我們去殺死那些......守護者什麼的，然後回到監禁處。

original: The sooner we get out of this place, the better.
string: 我們越快離開這裡越好。

original: I'm glad you're here. I don't think I could be doing this alone.
string: 我很高興你在這裡。我一個人應該辦不到。

original: I can't believe we found my mother alive... well, you know what I mean.
string: 我不敢相信我媽居然活著......呃，你知道我的意思。

original: Look at this place. I can't imagine choosing to come here. My mother must have been terrified.
string: 看看這地方。我不敢想像有人會自願來這裡。我媽媽應該是嚇壞了。

original: Let's keep moving. I feel like we're being watched.
string: 繼續前進吧。我有種被監視的感覺。

original: I'd heard stories about the Soul Cairn, but never thought I'd see it myself. So far it's... about what I imagined.
string: 我以前就聽過靈魂石塚的傳說，但是我從沒想過我會親眼目睹。目前為止見到的都差不多跟我想的一樣。

original: Look at the sky. What kind of a place is this?
string: 你看天空。這是什麼地方？

original: I feel terrible for the dead who end up here for eternity. Seems awful. Like they're still suffering.
string: 想到那些死者要待在這裡直到永恆就好心痛。感覺好糟。他們這樣就像在不斷受苦。

original: You'd think a vampire would be right at home in this place. You'd be wrong. Let's just find my mother and get out of here, quickly.
string: 你以為吸血鬼會覺得這裡很舒適嗎？錯得離譜。我們趕快找到我媽媽然後離開。

original: The air, the ground... this is all wrong.
string: 這空氣，這土地......都不對勁。

original: It is done. <Alias=Spouse> has been welcomed into the family.
string: 完成了。<Alias=Spouse>已加入家族。

original: Excellent. I trust she'll find her situation more accommodating, now that she is a member of the family.
string: 太好了，我相信她成為家族成員之後一定會較容易滿意現狀。

original: Excellent. I trust he'll find his situation more accommodating, now that he is a member of the family.
string: 太好了，我相信他成為家族成員之後一定會較容易滿意現狀。

original: You'll need to trust me. The family is safer this way.
string: 你必須相信我。家族這樣較安全。

original: I see... I... I understand. Thank you
string: 我知道......我......我懂了。謝謝你。

original: Hello.
string: 你好。

original: I... I feel... different. What happened?
string: 我......我感覺......不一樣了。發生什麼事了？

original: May I strongly suggest that you make a visit to this spouse of yours and "invite" her to the family by offering her Harkon's Gift.
string: 我強烈建議你去探訪你的妻子，然後提供赫岡的禮物給她，「邀請」她加入我們的家族。

original: It is the greatest token we can bestow upon those we love and wish to see protected.
string: 這是我們能夠給予我們的愛人，我們想要保護的人，最偉大的禮物了。

original: Put her mind to rest, allay her fear through vampiric seduction and when she is in a pliant condition, embrace her and bite her on the neck.
string: 安撫她的心靈，用吸血鬼的魅惑降低她的恐懼。等到她放鬆的時候就抱住她，然後咬她的脖子。

original: Nature will take care of the rest.
string: 接下來一切順其自然。

original: May I strongly suggest that you make a visit to this spouse of yours. And "invite" him to the family by offering him Harkon's Gift.
string: 我強烈建議妳去探訪妳的丈夫，然後提供赫岡的禮物給他，「邀請」他加入我們的家族。

original: It is the greatest token we can bestow upon those we love and wish to see protected.
string: 這是我們能夠給予我們的愛人，我們想要保護的人，最偉大的禮物了。

original: Put his mind to rest, allay his fear through vampiric seduction and when he is in a pliant condition, embrace him and bite him on the neck.
string: 安撫他的心靈，用吸血鬼的魅惑降低他的恐懼。等到他放鬆的時候就抱住他，然後咬他的脖子。

original: Nature will do the rest.
string: 接下來一切順其自然。

original: I understand the concern.
string: 我理解你的擔憂。

original: Good. I suspected you might possess some intellect.
string: 很好。我就知道你還有點智商。

original: You try my patience, <Alias=QuestGiver>.
string: 快說重點，<Alias=QuestGiver>。

original: My sincerest pardons, I but look after your own peace of mind.
string: 我致上我真誠的歉意。我只希望你能夠找到心靈的平靜。

original: Why, you would be distraught with emotion, perhaps even to the point of questioning your loyalty to this Court. And we ours to you.
string: 你可是會被那些情感吞噬。可能開始質疑自己對宮廷的忠誠度。我們也相對地會質疑自己對你的忠誠。

original: An unattended attachment, such as found in your beloved wife creates... an opportunity for unnecessary agitation.
string: 要是你親愛的妻子，沒有被「妥善照顧的話」，可是會帶來不必要的麻煩。

original: Should your blushing bride go missing, perhaps unable to bear the thought of living with a... a monster...
string: 假如你的妻子失蹤了，因為無法承受跟......一隻怪物......生活的念頭。

original: An unattended attachment, such as found in your beloved husband creates... an opportunity for unnecessary agitation.
string: 要是妳親愛的丈夫，沒有被「妥善照顧的話」，可是會帶來不必要的麻煩。

original: Should your husband go missing, perhaps unable to bear the thought of living with a... a monster...
string: 假如妳的丈夫失蹤了，因為無法承受跟......一隻怪物......生活的念頭。

original: Yes. I am married.
string: 是的。我結婚了。

original: Marriage is a fine institution, however, one that does present certain difficulties for such as like ourselves.
string: 婚姻是很好的制度，但是對我們吸血鬼而言會帶來某些不便。

original: And that's any of your business because... ?
string: 請問這關你什麼事......？

original: Do I detect a hint of reproach? I am only looking out for your best interests. And perhaps, a small measure of my own.
string: 我當真從你的語氣中聽出一絲責備？我只是在全心全意為你著想。但當然，有一小部分也是為了自己。

original: What can I do to help?
string: 我該怎麼幫你？
